title: Mitchell Abrasives 53-A 53 Round Abrasive Cord, Aluminum Oxide 180 Grit .040" Diameter x 50 Feet
features: Our cords sand and clean hard to reach areas where your standard tools will not fit
Firm enough so they won't tear or fray and will hold up in all types of applications
Aluminum Oxide-tough, long life abrasive, ideal on ferrous containing, high tensile material
Ideal on metal, plastic, wood, or virtually any surface, fits in slots, grooves and small holes
Cords and Tapes are fully coated on all sides for more complete and effective coverage
description: Mitchell Abrasives is the manufacturer of round and flat abrasive cords. They are used to sand, clean, debur, or polish hard-to-reach areas. Ideal in maintenance applications, refining metal parts, or creating grooves on virtually any surface. They come in all sizes and grit combinations to fit your special project. The cords and tapes apply to so many applications in the metal working, manufacturing, tool & die, and woodworking industries.
